Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] OST-RF - Arranged Soundtrack
Mod.Author: MikeDoesAudio, Final Fantasy & Chill
Mod.Description: - OST-RF (Original Soundtrack Refinement) - The only complete reorchestration of the entire Final Fantasy VIII score. Mixed by 1 person, in the same studio for a consistent and immersive experience. Now with Violins by XuJumica and Guitars by Domigit Suggested Volume - 60 - Suggested Volume - 60

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: Updated songs for Version 1.2: - Under Her Control - Don't Be Afraid - Guitars by Domigit - Balamb Garden - The Oath - Blue Fields - The Landing - The Stage is Set - SeeD - The Legendary Beast - Find your way - The Man With The Machine Gun - A Sacrifice - Compression of Time - Ami - Timber Owls - Love Grows - Only a Plank Between One and Perdition - Force your Way - Live Violins by XuJumica - Fisherman's Horizon - Waltz for the Moon - Live Violins by XuJumica - Main menu music now added!
